title: Inspector v1: add agent debug endpoint
description: Add /api/v1/projects/:name/agents/:id/debug with poll/tmux/parser/stream/error internals

title: Authorize webhook receiver probe requests
description: Medium: src/api/webhook.ts probe-receiver endpoint does not send bearer token, causing false negatives against protected receivers. Include token in probe request path.
design: Reuse webhook auth header builder to keep probe auth behavior identical to normal webhook delivery semantics.
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/v1/webhook/probe-receiver must send Authorization header to /harness-webhook when token is available; token precedence is request body token override then webhook config token then none; keep /health probe behavior unchanged; add tests proving protected receiver probes pass with valid token and fail without token.

title: Per-agent webhook callbacks
description: Add callback object on create-agent, persist on agent, sender uses per-agent callback with global fallback, receiver consumes routing fields in payload, update tests

title: Compact brief from assistant messages
description: Change compact agent brief to string[] sourced from readAgentMessages assistant history: processing=>last 4, idle/exited/error=>last 1; fallback status

title: Compact API response mode
description: Add ?compact=true mode for agent create/get/list/messages-last, cached brief field, callback token redaction, tmuxTarget in project summaries, and X-Agent-Harness-Mode header

title: Make API auth secure-by-default
description: Security blocker: current auth is optional. Require bearer auth by default for /api/v1/* (except health) and force explicit opt-out dev flag/config; document migration and add tests for default-on behavior.

title: Tighten CORS defaults for production safety
description: Security blocker: app currently enables permissive CORS globally. Restrict origins by default and make allowed origins explicit config; keep local-dev override path; add auth+CORS regression tests.

title: 6D: Webhook receiver — separate binary in same repo, receives webhooks, posts to Discord + OpenClaw system event
Shared credential parser utilities
description: Add reusable Claude/Codex credential parsing + metadata extraction utilities aligned with ai-quota file shapes

title: Remove insecure tracked runtime config and add safe examples
description: Security blocker: tracked harness.json currently binds 0.0.0.0. Stop tracking unsafe local runtime config, add safe example config(s), and ensure local overrides are gitignored where appropriate.

title: Add CI workflows and required checks
description: Quality gap: add GitHub Actions for check/typecheck/test on push/PR, cache deps, and define required status checks for branch protection.

title: Harden provider default flags for public distribution
description: Security blocker: default provider extraArgs include dangerous bypass flags (--dangerously-skip-permissions / --yolo). Switch to safer defaults, require explicit opt-in for dangerous mode, and update tests/docs.

title: Fix poller stale-agent loop on missing tmux pane/session
description: High: In src/poller/poller.ts when tmux returns WINDOW_NOT_FOUND or SESSION_NOT_FOUND, poller only logs and returns. Agent stays stale and never transitions/exits, runtime state leaks, repeated error spam. Handle as terminal: mark exited, emit status/event, clear runtime state.
design: Handle missing tmux pane/session as terminal poller path (same class as pane-dead) with one centralized helper for transition+event+runtime cleanup.
acceptance_criteria: When poller tmux reads return WINDOW_NOT_FOUND or SESSION_NOT_FOUND, transition agent to exited immediately, emit status_changed and agent_exited exactly once, clear per-agent runtime state to stop repeat error loops, and leave agent queryable as exited; add regression tests in src/poller/*.test.ts for missing window/session.

title: Fix Claude subscription discovery/selection
description: Add claude token-file discovery + fix selected subscription startup/login behavior

title: Accept case-insensitive Bearer auth scheme
description: Low: src/webhook-receiver.ts matches only literal 'Bearer '. RFC allows case-insensitive scheme. Normalize scheme casing/spacing in auth parser.

title: Subscription integration tests
description: Add unit/integration coverage for schema validation, env contamination prevention, and multi-subscription isolation

title: Inspector: subscription provenance + webhook controls
description: Expose full subscription discovery provenance and add webhook status/test/probe tooling in inspector

title: tmux env isolation fix
description: Remove session-global env mutation for agent credentials and set env per spawned process/window

title: Quote tmux attach command session target
description: Medium: src/session/attach.ts returns unquoted shell command. Session names with spaces/metachars break manual attach guidance. Escape/quote session in attach command string.

title: Define release/versioning policy and automation
description: Release gap: add SemVer policy, changelog process, tag/version consistency checks, and optional release automation; prevent tag/package drift.

title: Expand README to production-grade public quickstart
description: Docs gap: add prerequisites, install modes, secure config/auth setup, API auth usage, webhook setup, threat/safety notes, and troubleshooting. Current README too minimal for OSS users.

title: Codex workspace guard support
description: Apply forced_chatgpt_workspace_id when configured and enforce workspace/account guardrails

title: Wave 1: Research (CAO, agent CLIs, tmux, Rivet)
6G: Cron safety net — periodic poll for stuck/completed agents
Harden npm package contents for public publish
description: Packaging blocker: npm pack currently includes .beads, docs/research, tests, and harness.json. Add files whitelist or .npmignore so published artifact contains only runtime/needed assets.

title: Subscription schema + API surface
description: Add subscriptions schema to config, add GET /api/v1/subscriptions, extend create-agent payload with optional subscription id

title: Credential runtime dirs + env scrub
description: Create per-agent runtime credential dirs (0700), copy/symlink minimal auth files, scrub conflicting env vars for Claude/Codex

title: Inspector v1: harden web workflow
description: Stabilize /inspect UX, improve error states/reconnects, and validate on all providers

title: Fix Claude discovery dedupe identity collisions
description: Medium: src/subscriptions/discovery.ts dedupes Claude subs by normalized label, collapsing distinct credentials with same label. Dedupe by token fingerprint/path identity, not label.
design: Identity priority: parsed token fingerprint first, then resolved token-file/sourceDir path fingerprint; labels are display-only and must never drive dedupe.
acceptance_criteria: Claude discovery must return distinct subscriptions for distinct credential identities even when labels collide; dedupe by token fingerprint when available, fallback to canonical path identity when token unavailable; duplicate token across multiple paths should collapse to one; add regression tests in src/subscriptions/discovery.test.ts for label collision and same-token dedupe.

title: Fix CLI bin distribution strategy for npm release
description: Packaging blocker: package.json bin points to ./agent-harness which is absent in source package unless prebuilt. Define supported install path (source + bunx vs prebuilt binary), adjust bin/scripts/publish pipeline accordingly.

title: 6F: NixOS module — systemd units for both harness server + webhook receiver
Redact receiver logs to avoid payload content leaks
description: High: src/webhook-receiver.ts logs raw payload when routing fields missing, leaking lastMessage/extra to logs. Log metadata only or redact/trim sensitive fields.
design: Introduce a sanitized-log payload shape and route all receiver warning/info logs through it to prevent accidental secret/content leakage.
acceptance_criteria: Receiver logs must never include raw payload fields lastMessage or extra; for missing-routing logs emit only safe metadata (event, project, agentId, provider, status, timestamp, and routing-present flags); behavior of webhook handling/actions remains unchanged; add test coverage to assert redacted logging.

title: Send terminal webhooks from any non-terminal prior state
description: High: In src/webhook/client.ts status_changed handler only sends when from=processing. waiting_input->idle/error/exited misses immediate webhook and depends on safety net. Trigger on transition into terminal state from any non-terminal state.
design: Use explicit helpers for terminal/non-terminal statuses; gate on destination terminal + source non-terminal instead of from==processing.
acceptance_criteria: Immediate webhook emit when status_changed transitions to idle/error/exited from starting/processing/waiting_input; no emit for non-terminal transitions or terminal->terminal; safety-net must remain fallback and not duplicate after successful immediate delivery; add regression tests in src/webhook/client.test.ts for waiting_input->idle and starting->error.

title: 6A: CLI entrypoint + bun build --compile binary packaging
6E: OpenClaw skill file for harness orchestration
6C: Webhook client — POST to configured URL on agent completion
Add OSS legal baseline (LICENSE + policies + package metadata)
description: Open-source blocker: add LICENSE, SECURITY.md, CONTRIBUTING.md, CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md; add package metadata fields (license/repository/homepage/bugs) in package.json; verify dependency license inventory generation path.

title: Manager subscription resolution
description: Thread subscription selection into manager createAgent flow with provider matching, validation, and runtime materialization planning

title: Remove personal path assumptions from subscription discovery
description: OSS blocker: discovery currently scans personal dotfiles secret paths under /home/jorge/dotfiles/...; replace with generic defaults only and explicit config/env inputs; update discovery tests and docs.

title: Honor CLAUDE_CONFIG_DIR/CODEX_HOME when includeDefaults=false
description: Medium: src/subscriptions/discovery.ts currently ignores env override dirs when includeDefaults=false. Explicit env dirs should always be scanned; only default-home paths should be gated by includeDefaults.

title: Inspector v1: mismatch detection badges
description: Detect likely harness-vs-tmux divergence and surface badges in UI
